head.title: February 16-22: INTERNATIONAL; JOUSTING ON CLEAN AIR

hedline.hl1: February 16-22: INTERNATIONAL; JOUSTING ON CLEAN AIR

block.p: Seven state attorneys general, all Democrats and mostly in the Northeast, announced a lawsuit against the Environmental Protection Agency for failing to update the Clean Air Act to include carbon dioxide. Led by the New York State attorney general's office, the officials' suit is the third joint state action against the Bush administration under the Clean Air Act in the last two months. It underlines a growing antagonism between the Northeast and the administration on environmental issues.

Seven state attorneys general, all Democrats and mostly in the Northeast, announced a lawsuit against the Environmental Protection Agency for failing to update the Clean Air Act to include carbon dioxide. Led by the New York State attorney general's office, the officials' suit is the third joint state action against the Bush administration under the Clean Air Act in the last two months. It underlines a growing antagonism between the Northeast and the administration on environmental issues.
